projects.title: Patient Alerts System Development
projects.description: Led a team in developing a patient alerts system, ensuring timely vital sign notifications for effective intervention and patient care. Implemented a robust backend notification module, ensuring seamless delivery of push notifications across FCM and APNS, enhancing user reach and engagement. Designed and supervised the implementation of an audio/video call module, enabling personalized patient-provider communication and improving care experience. Skillfully integrated EHR/EMR systems, ensuring seamless data exchange among healthcare providers for informed decision-making.

projects.title: Online Development Environment on Kubernetes (GKE)
projects.description: Architected and developed an online development environment on Kubernetes (GKE), streamlining workflows for students.

projects.title: Serverless Code Compilation System
projects.description: Engineered a serverless code compilation system using Docker and Google Cloud Run, simplifying code execution for our code judge.

projects.title: Applicant Tracking System (ATS) on the Juntrax Platform
projects.description: Developed an Applicant Tracking System (ATS) on the Juntrax Platform, recognized for client satisfaction. Built a customizable report generation framework using MongoDB aggregate and AWS Lambda. Implemented employee information caching with Redis, achieving a 70% speed improvement for inquiries.

projects.title: Backend Performance Enhancement
projects.description: Implemented Redis-based caching and rate limiting to enhance backend performance by efficiently managing cached responses.

projects.title: Question Banks, Tests, and Courses modules Development
projects.description: Collaborated on the development of Question Banks, Tests, and Courses modules, enabling personalized learning environments.

projects.title: Examly's Ionic App Development and Publication
projects.description: Created and published Examly's Ionic App on Google Play Store, expanding accessibility and user base.

projects.title: Project Design and Project Plan Documents
projects.description: Contributed to creating structured Project Design and Project Plan Documents for organized development.

projects.title: AI-based Cover Letter Generator
projects.description: An AI-based cover letter generator that generates cool cover letters based on designation and skills can help individuals to create an attention-grabbing cover letter quickly and easily. This tool can analyze the user's skills and design a cover letter that highlights these abilities, which can then be sent to potential employers.

projects.title: Time Complexity Calculator
projects.description: A simple UI to calculate the time complexity of the code snippet. Under the hood, it uses OpenAI APIs to calculate.

projects.title: IFSC Code Finder Web App
projects.description: A web app to find the IFSC code of the banks in major cities of India. Client-side pagination, cache and search techniques are implemented in this project. Also, marking a bank as a favourite option is present.

projects.title: String to Hex Color Code NPM Library
projects.description: An NPM library that converts a given string to hex colour code, is really useful when you need N number of random colours which is also persistent based on text.

certifications_or_extras.education: Computer Science Master of Computer Applications, KCT

questions.question: Explain your experience with Django and Django REST Framework (DRF).
Describe a time when you had to optimize database queries for a Django application.
How do you ensure proper authentication and authorization in your APIs?
What is your experience with PostgreSQL and Redis?
Explain the concept of RESTful APIs and their principles.
Have you worked with Celery or other message queues? If so, describe your experience.
Given a list of integers, write a function to find the largest element.
How would you design a rate limiter for an API?
Describe your experience with AWS services like S3 and Lambda.
How do you approach writing unit and integration tests?
